basics.name: Sonu Jose
basics.label: Cloud DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Dynamic and accomplished professional with a proven track record in DevOps, Kubernetes, and Cloud Engineering. Bringing deep experience in bridging developers with releases and a passion for building tools and applications for Platform Engineers. Like everyone in the container world, I find great pleasure in using Kubectl. Behind the scenes, I'm constantly amazed at how typical Kubernetes solutions are designed and implemented.
